name: nanbi1
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wnan(w0, w2), wnan(w1, w2)))

stmt.origin: 3bitr4g(wb(w0, w1), wnan(w0, w2), wnan(w1, w2), wi(w0, wn(w2)), wi(w1, wn(w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wnan(w0, w2), wnan(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wi(w0, wn(w2)), wi(w1, wn(w2))))
-| wb(wnan(w0, w2), wi(w0, wn(w2)))
-| wb(wnan(w1, w2), wi(w1, wn(w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wnan(w0, w2), wnan(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wi(w0, wn(w2)), wi(w1, wn(w2))))
-| wb(wnan(w0, w2), wi(w0, wn(w2)))
-| wb(wnan(w1, w2), wi(w1, wn(w2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wi(w0, wn(w2)), wi(w1, wn(w2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wnan(w0, w2), wnan(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wnan(w0, w2), wi(w0, wn(w2)))
-| wb(wnan(w1, w2), wi(w1, wn(w2)))

|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wnan(w0, w2), wnan(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wnan(w1, w2), wi(w1, wn(w2)))
|- wi(wb(w0, w1), wb(wnan(w0, w2), wnan(w1, w2)))

comment: Introduce a right anti-conjunct to both sides of a logical equivalence. (Contributed by Anthony Hart, 1-Sep-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 27-Jun-2020.)
